start.text: You come to a fork in the road. Do you go left or right?

go_left.text: You go left and see a small house. Do you enter the house or continue down the path?

go_right.text: You go right and find a flipped cart. Do you investigate or continue?

enter_house.text: You enter the house and are attacked by a goblin!

continue_path.text: You continue down the path deeper into the forest.

investigate_cart.text: You investigate the cart and find some gold.

continue_on_right_path.text: You continue walking down the path.
